title: 2026 AIML Residency Program
description:
Apple AIML Residency Program — Applications Now Open

Are you passionate about machine learning and eager to apply your research or technical skills to real-world innovation? The Apple AIML Residency Program (2026) is a one-year, full-time opportunity for advanced-degree graduates, engineers, and researchers to collaborate with Apple teams and push the boundaries of what’s possible in AI.

 

Who we’re looking for:

- Master’s, PhD, or postdoctoral graduates

- Software or hardware engineers interested in ML

- Academics or professors seeking hands-on industry experience

 

What you’ll gain:

- Mentorship from world-class Apple engineers and researchers

- Opportunities to publish at top research venues

- Real-world experience developing AI-powered products and features

 

Work alongside experts.
Grow your technical and research skill set.
Help shape the future of machine learning at Apple.
